Title: Dream Cruise
Plot: Jack, an American lawyer working in Tokyo, has fallen in love with the wife of his most valued client, Eiji. Despite Jack's deep-rooted fear of the sea, he reluctantly accepts Eiji's invitation to join the couple for a day trip on the Tokyo Bay. Pleasure turns to terror as they discover the watery destiny in store for each of them.
GuestStars: Ethan Amis, Daniel Gillies, Yoshino Kimura, Ryo Ishibashi, Miho Ninagawa
